about.title: At Taiko Labs, it’s our goal to unlock Ethereum for the masses. We are developing the Taiko ZK-EVM: a Based Contestable/Booster Rollup.
about.text: Our roles are remote, offer competitive compensation (cash + equity), and an opportunity to help scale Ethereum — a technology and ecosystem that is changing the world.

banner.title: Don’t see what you’re looking for?
